ygData.subject: Re: Unicorn Horn announced at The Concert Hall
ygData.msgSnippet: Does the lightstone effect work while in your inventory, or is it just while holding the horn? MacGrough 17th Song Bard Solusek Ro Wanderers ... From: David
ygData.messageBody:
Does the lightstone effect work while in your inventory, or is it just while
holding the horn?

MacGrough
17th Song Bard
Solusek Ro Wanderers

-----Original Message-----
From: David Lendrum <Karnek@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, September 20, 1999 11:21 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Unicorn Horn announced at The Concert Hall
